Q22: Please select the health professionals who are responsible for recording weight gain and monitoring it 
during pregnancy:
 1   General practitioner or family doctor
 2   Obstetrician
 3   Midwife
 4   Gynaecologist
 5   Nurse
 6   Dietician
 7   Nutritionist
 8   Community health care worker
 9   Other, please specify: _____________________________
 10   No information available
